name: Successful Case

children.description: Given an user enters the MetroCencosud page

When the user search a product
| number | 1 |
| article | Lavadora |
User enters 'Lavadora' then hits [ENTER] into Option search article
User clicks on [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (63cab5f7d898c32e52649556b2c527c8)] -> xpath: //*[@class='product-item__add-to-cart product-add-to-cart btn red add-to-cart']]
Then the user check the product on basket
